text: Aur (Allah farmata hai) woh waqt yaad karo jab humne Firoun walon se tumhein nijaat di jinka haal yeh tha ke tumhein sakht azaab mein mubtila rakhte thay, tumhare beton (sons) ko qatal karte aur tumhari auraton ko zinda rehne dete thay aur is mein tumhare Rubb ki taraf se tumhari badi aazmaish thi
